title: Games I Hate
text: These games give me a bad time
author: Brian Kernighan

title: Games you should play
text: Before you die, you have to play these games
author: Max Kanat-Alexander

title: Games to play when you are feeling lucky
text: If you are feeling lucky, play one of the following games. You'll have a good time
author: Why The Lucky Stiff

title: Do not play these games
text: Don't waste your time, these games will make you hate yourself
author: Kent Beck

title: If you are under the influence, have a blast playing these games
text: Whenever I'm under the influence of any substance, I just put one of the next games and play along
author: Edward V. Berard

title: Games to stop loving yourself
text: The most disastrous thing that you can ever play are these games.
author: Alan Kay

title: Forget about life and play all of the next games
text: Whenever you are feeling stuck in life, turn on your console and play one of these games. It will make you forget about everything you hate.
author: C.A.R. Hoare

title: Beautiful looking games
text: These games have the most beautiful graphics of all time
author: David Thomas

title: Skip all of the next games
text: Not worth your time, go ahead and play anything but these games
author: Donald Knuth

title: Greates Games of all time
text: It's not a bug; each game is just perfect.
author: Lernantino
